events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team is excited to review your experience and skills.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, focusing on software development roles to find the best match.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your application and will guide you through the next steps towards joining our engineering team.
We completed the initial screening of your profile and are impressed by your background. We will contact you shortly to schedule an interview.
Thank you for your prompt reply. We appreciate your enthusiasm and look forward to discussing your technical skills in greater detail.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-16 at 14:00 UTC. Please prepare accordingly, focusing on software engineering problems.
The technical interview was successfully completed. The engineering panel appreciated your problem-solving approach and coding skills.
Following your strong technical interview, we have scheduled the HR interview for 2024-05-19 to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
The HR interview went well and they were pleased with your communication and alignment with company values.
We are excited to propose you an offer to join our engineering team. Details of the package and benefits are included in the official offer letter.
We received your positive feedback regarding the offer. Thank you for considering our proposal enthusiastically.
You have accepted the offer to join our team as a Software Engineer. We look forward to your contributions and growth with us.
Your onboarding process has started. Welcome to the team! We will guide you through all initial setups and integration with your manager.
The hiring process is now complete. Congratulations on joining the engineering team. We are eager to achieve great things together.
